fields.fieldText:
Have we met the client face to face?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_mlraWarning2
fields.fieldText:
A “Yes” answer to either of the above means the client must be treated as high risk and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) procedures as set out in the firm’s Client Acceptance Guidance Notes (available on the intranet) applied. 

Record EDD procedures undertaken below:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_or1
fields.fieldText: Is there public interest in the client?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_orpick1yes
fields.fieldText: If yes, please detail below why you are happy to proceed:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_orpick2yes
fields.fieldText: If yes, why?

fields.name: wTxt7
fields.fieldText: This record is in approval so no changes will be saved.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: ﻿Business Risk Assessment

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Copy_1_of_beneficiariesHeader
fields.fieldText: OBJECTIVITY / CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ETC.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj1
fields.fieldText: Do we already act for any parties involved or have we acted in the past?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objpickyes1
fields.fieldText: If yes, please give details below:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj3
fields.fieldText: Are there any other relationships or other issues which may threaten our objectivity or could be perceived to do so?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objpickyes10
fields.fieldText: If yes, please give details below:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj4
fields.fieldText: Are we involved in any dispute with any party?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj5
fields.fieldText: Have potential conflicts been identified for any other reason?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj6
fields.fieldText: (If applicable) Is the level of fees likely to affect audit independence?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj7
fields.fieldText: Considering all the above, have we identified significant personal or professional relationships or conflicts of interest which could threaten our objectivity or be seen to do so?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objpickyes7
fields.fieldText: If yes, please summarise below.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_obj8
fields.fieldText: Can safeguards be implemented which will reduce the threat(s) to an acceptable level?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objpickyes8
fields.fieldText: If yes, please describe below:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objwarn1
fields.fieldText:
AUDIT AND TAX

Ø Tax work will be carried out by a team independent of the audit team and under the supervision of a separate Partner

 

ACCOUNTS AND AUDIT WORK

Ø Producing statutory accounts in our accounting software which only involve services of a routine or mechanical nature.

Ø We will not initiate transactions or carry out any accounting services that would involve us undertaking any part in the role of management.

Ø We should include safeguards to ensure that we do not carry out any more in the preparation of statutory accounting services other than the above. Either a separate team inputting into CaseWare or 2nd Partner review.

 

NFP

AAR / TPS EOYC - other non-audit services expected to be completed by auditor as part of role and are separate from the audit process.

fields.name: Safeguard_Applied_Copy
fields.fieldText: Safeguard Applied
